description.displayText:
Tava was professional, sweet, my girls loved her. She was communicative and always had a smile and great attitude. I am unsure if I will find anyone as good as her for next school year, but I am hopeful. 
Tava was perfect and I hated that she was graduating this year and couldn't stick around after. Also, COVID-19 had a negative impact on everything and after school was closed, I couldn't use Tava anymore.
